description: Try our easy to follow Thai Beef Soup With Basil & Omelette Strips recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Thai Beef Soup With Basil & Omelette Strips Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 cm piece ginger, peeled, thinly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Place stock into a large saucepan with garlic, lemongrass, ginger and chilli. Simmer for 10 minutes. Add carrot, celery and mushroom and simmer for a further 10 minutes. Keep warm.
Meanwhile, cook noodles following the packet directions. Drain.
For omelette strips, whisk eggs with sesame oil. Season with salt and pepper.

Heat oil in a large non-stick frying pan over medium-high heat. Add half the egg mixture and swirl to coat pan. Cook for 1-2 minutes or until set. Flip over, cook for 30 seconds, then remove from pan and roll up. Repeat with remaining mixture. Cut into 1cm slices. Set aside.
Stir lime juice, fish sauce and sugar into stock. Add beef and cook for 2 minutes. Add spring onion and basil, reserving a little of each to garnish.
Divide noodles between bowls. Add soup, veg and meat. Top with omelette strips, extra chilli, basil and onion.
